name: Pastelle ✨ (Demo)
description:
Pastelle used to be the first video game I made (january 2020).

 It's really more of a demo, and it's about me trying to make things work with Construct 3 (the game engine I use). 

You play as a young wizard who can shoot shiny stars on ennemies. Controls :

  • ZQSD  / ⬅⬆➡⬇ : Move
  • Left click : shiny stars
  • Right click : circle of fire balls (really useful but consume mana)
  • Space : teleportation (consume mana)

The game is still a bit buggy and can be played in less dans 2 minutes. Have fun ! 

You can see the creation process in this twitter thread
